CustomField.inlineHelpText: On receipt of the requested assessment, I determine that the patient:
CustomField.label: On receipt of assessment, patient is:

value.fullName: 1 - Is capable of providing informed consent
value.label: 1 - Is capable of providing informed consent

value.fullName: 2 - Is not capable of providing informed consent
value.label: 2 - Is not capable of providing informed consent
